entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH, St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:54 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 17 except 12 near Lake Ontario.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers or a few thunderstorms beginning this morning. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 then light near noon. High 17 except 12 near Lake Ontario. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then light overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
